body_html: Was this solved? I'm having the same problem. Code here: https://github.com/openai/InfoGAN ran fine on CPU. On GPU, it ran successfully for a small number of epochs before loss returned NaN. All (fresh) runs now return NaN as loss. Ubuntu 14, TensforFlow 0.9.0rc0, CUDA 7.0, cuDNN 4.0, 3x geforce titan X.
